text: Dr. Martin is the best primary care Dr I have ever seen. I am 60 years old and have been a patient of hers for nearly 8 yrs now. I am sad she is retiring but yet wish her the best. Finding a replacement for  her will not  be easy.

name: Delight Wright
text: I would recommend Dr. Martin based on: Her professional and approachable manner, attentive to my questions and concerns, well-educated, years of medical experience, quite knowledgable with her diagnosis & recommendations/treatment, a compassionate & personable physician, detailed oriented & provides explanations that are clear and understandable.  In todays fast paced medical field, it is rare that you will discover a doctor willing to give their clients quality care, and time required during each visit.

name: LaTanja Banks
text: Dr. Martin is truly a wonderful doctor. She is definitely thorough and consistent in her care for her patients. From the short time I have been her patient, she has evaluated my health/medicines, and made adjustments that have already had a positive impact on my health. She takes the time to explain what is wrong and will work with the patient to create a strategy for improving their health. I highly recommend Dr. Martin as a physician who cares.

name: Mary Dunne
text: Because I was getting sick every other month so it seemed with chronic bronchitis, I switched doctors and made an appointment with Dr. Patricia Martin Nov. 2015. I was totally encouraged with my examine and Dr. Martin was very professional and completely interested in helping me solve my health issues with some additional tests and referrals we conquered  a small cancer tumor. Her staff from the reception desk, to the nurse are all friendly and professional. I would refer Dr. Martin to anyone who has a medical problem. She is an awesome Medical professional doctor.!

name: godscountrypeyton
text:
Straight and to the point, which is why you see a doctor, not for confidence boosters. Dr. Martin is obviously a caring individual, but at the same time direct in her information to you. Her job is to better a patients life and inform us as to the things we are doing wrong in order to do that. We all do a LOT wrong when it comes to our health, hence the reason you are seeing a doctor. She has a very limited time in a patients life and must direct us, without vagueness , in that limited time to improve our lives.  I would definitely recommend Dr. Martin.
- Kyle Tyler

name: Joseph Patterson
text: The worst doctor EVER. She is mean, unkind and ruthless. She doesn't care and made my wife feel ridiculed. She made fun of her body and everything about her. I will be seeing an attorney and reporting her unethical behavior to every medical association in the country. This poor excuse of a human being is blessed I wasn't present. AVOID this doctor. I only gave 1star because I couldn't give a zero.

name: James Crosby
text: I saw her 2 times to many...I had to go out of town for a few months...out of diabetes medicine..I called there so many times and no answer..left messages...no return call...I called and even spoke to billing ..I asked why  will they not answer there or return my calls?? The girl acted as though that was ever the first time that has happened..she promise me she would email someone and I should get a call.....NEVER HAPPENED!! PITIFUL POVERTY PRACTISE...I have never experienced such lack of professional people including the doctors mis-handling of her answering service...EVIDENTLY SHE HAS MORE MONEY THAN GOD TO BE SO DIS CONCERNING ABOUT TRYING TO SCHEDULE APPOINTMENTS...IM DONE WITH THIS OFFICE!!!

name: Mozella Davis
text:
Dr Martin is a very thorough and plain spoken   doctor.  It I s their responsibility  to prevent prescription  misuse instead of  writing  prescriptions to get you out if the office. Keep up the good works Dr Martin for less drug addicts and big profits  from the sale of drugs.
They are getting rich on selling them on the streets.

name: Jonathan Walker
text: Doesn't submit prescription renewals in a remotely timely manner. This is especially important for those with diabetes who need this medicine to keep blood sugar under control.

name: Latoya Davis
text: I hate her she is rude she told me if I take a shower that my feet won't be stinky she calls me out of my name avoid this doc is no good

name: Deidra Garner
text: Very good, she takes time to pin point the problem.

name: Daryl Parker
text: Rude

name: Monica Deason
text: Dr. Beaty is kind, compassionate, and very knowledgeable. Of all my specialists, he is by far my favorite so, I made him my primary.  I feel safe with him in every aspect of my health. He always spends enough time with me to make sure I am comfortable with my plan of care.  I have a horrible chronic cough that he never gives up on. I feel certain that one day he will beat it!

name: vicki Prichard
text: 12 days at Grandview with covid was a frightening experience.  Dr. Beaty’s warm bedside manner and encouragement helped get me through.  I felt he was thorough and took time to explain covid pneumonia knowing I was there alone and scared.  He was a 5 star doctor!

name: Sheila P
text: He is so compassionate with his patients... He has been our doctor for many years...

name: cola bama
text: Dr.Beaty is the best.I used to be a float nurse at Montclair Hospital(later called Trinity and now called Grandview)I met and interacted with many of the physicians there.Dr.Beaty is the one I chose to be my personal physician.He is intelligent,wise,and above all,very kind.

name: LaTonya Stearnes
text: I have been a patient of his for many years he is very compassionate and very thorough i would trust him with my life

name: Robyn Simmons
text: Very caring and compassionate doctor. Wish I had found him sooner!!
